title: Unspecified diabetes mellitus with ketoacidosis
inclusion: Diabetic: acidosis without mention of coma
Diabetic: ketoacidosis without mention of coma
exclusion: complications of pregnancy, childbirth and the puerperium
symptoms, signs and abnormal clinical and laboratory findings, not elsewhere classified
transitory endocrine and metabolic disorders specific to fetus and newborn
diabetes mellitus (in): pregnancy, childbirth and the puerperium
